Package com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.service

Class AuthorService

java.lang.Object
com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.service.AuthorService
@Service public class AuthorService extends Object
Service class for managing author-related business logic. Provides methods to interact with Author entities.

  • Method Details

    • createAuthor

      public AuthorDTO createAuthor(AuthorDTO authorDTO)
      Creates a new author in the library system.
      Parameters:
      authorDTO - the data transfer object containing author details
      Returns:
      the created AuthorDTO with assigned ID

    • updateAuthor

      public AuthorDTO updateAuthor(Long id, AuthorDTO authorDTO)
      Updates an existing author identified by the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the author to update
      authorDTO - the data transfer object with updated author details
      Returns:
      the updated AuthorDTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the author with the specified ID is not found

    • deleteAuthor

      public void deleteAuthor(Long id)
      Deletes an author from the library system by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the author to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the author with the specified ID is not found

    • getAllAuthors

      public List<AuthorDTO> getAllAuthors()
      Retrieves a list of all authors from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of AuthorDTO objects

    • getAuthorById

      public AuthorDTO getAuthorById(Long authorId)
      Retrieves an author by their unique identifier. This method queries the repository to find an author with the specified ID. If no author is found, it throws an EntityNotFoundException with a descriptive message.
      Parameters:
      authorId - the unique identifier of the author to retrieve
      Returns:
      the AuthorDTO object corresponding to the given ID
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no author with the specified ID exists in the database

    • saveAuthor

      public void saveAuthor(Author author)
      Saves an author to the database. This method persists the provided Author object to the database using the repository. If the author already exists (based on its ID), it will be updated; otherwise, a new author will be created.
      Parameters:
      author - the Author object to save
